mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(content, post_id, member_id) VALUE (#{request.content}, #{request.postId}, #{request.memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.member_id AS writer_id, ft.fcm_token FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN fcm_token ft ON m.id = ft.member_id WHERE p.id = #{postId}
